casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, ex rel. Giovannina ZITO, Sister of Michael Zito, Relator-Appellant, v. COMMISSIONER OF IMMIGRATION, PORT OF NEW YORK, Respondent-Appellee. No. 107. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Oct. 19, 1931. Francis X. Mancuso, of New York City (Sidney Schindler, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. George Z. Medalie, U. S. Atty., of New York City (David Paley, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for respondent

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed on the authority of Chung v. Nagle, 15 F.(2d) 789 (C. C. A. 9); U. S. ex rel. Grimaldi v. Ebey, 12 F.(2d) 922 (C. C. A. 7); U. S. ex rel. Melchiore Spataro v. Day, 23 F.(2d) 1005 (C. C. A. 2).
